transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha sir whatsapp join karwaiyega.
Customer: Join hu sir mai already ek second line par aaiyega.



Trade se by lead lete hai sir aap trade.indiamart.com karke.
Customer: Usse bhi nahi mil raha kuch bhi nahi aaya same to same hai.
Executive: Mai check karke idhar se dikha bhi deta hu wahi problem hai sab kuch sab jagah matlab mere ko aisa lagta hai na ki aapke paas iske regarding leads hi nahi aati hai to mere ko kya dikhega.

Customer: False correspondence aa raha hai.
Customer: Ikka dukka aate hain kabhi kabhi.
Executive: To isme se kuch convert ho raha hai nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Nahi calls aisa kuch nahi.
Executive: O inquiries ka sir.
Customer: Inquiries ka matlab inquiries bhi calls aati hai indirect inquiries to nahi aayi hai.
Customer: Jo mai kaam aaj tak jo hai na aaj tak jo hai na jyadatar mai leads hi pe kaam kiya hu inquiries call bahut kam hi aati hai.
Executive: India nahi nahi abhi tak dekhiye 15 inquiry aa chuki hai aapke paas mein aur inquiries wale buyers and highly interested hote hain.
Customer: Wo inquiry kahan aati hai mere ko dikhaiye zara sa.
Executive: Aap apni screen share kijiye mai aapko batata hu dekhiye yahan se dikhti hai aapko dekhiye.
Executive: Ye lead manager.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ye scoop ka sign dikhta hai yahan pe direct pe click karna hai aapko mere me upar nahi hoga ye aur direct fir niche apply karna hai theek hai ye direct inquiries hoti hai ye jo hoti hai ispe to aap kaam hi nahi karte hain bilkul bhi.
Customer: To mere ko pata rahega tab na pehle se abhi tak dikhega hi nahi dikhai nahi hai inquiries pe sir jyada jyada highly jyada app.
Executive: App jo rehta hai app me bhi kahin nahi show karta hai na kahan pe app me show karta hai mai jyada app hi chalata hu.
Executive: Aap apni screen share kijiye mai batata hu.
Customer: Screen kaise share hoga kis mein login hai aapka mobile mein laptop mein.
Executive: Laptop mein.
Executive: Laptop mein dekhiye aapko dekhiye ye jo dikh raha hai ye jahan pe mera circle hai is tarah se wo dikh raha hoga theek hai.
Executive: To ispe click karne ke baad me fir entire screen dikh raha hoga iske andar entire screen pe click karna then share karna hai.
Executive: Theek hai share kijiye.

Customer: Gaya kya.
Customer: Ja hi nahi raha kya karu.
Customer: Gaya kya nahi ja raha the site will be able to see the content.
Executive: Kya likha hua aa raha hai.
Customer: The site will be able to see the content of your screen.
Executive: Kya matlab hua.

Customer: Dobara se dekhiye ek baar.

Customer: Kuch hua kya.
Executive: Ha ha show ho gayi.
Executive: Indiamart open kijiye wo.

Customer: Kahan pe show karta hai lead manager.
Executive: Lead manager pe click kijiye.









Customer: Kahan pe filter pe jana hai.
Executive: Ha.

Executive: Yahan pe kahan jana hai.
Customer: Location mein Indian kijiye.
Customer: Location upar.
Customer: Direct direct.
Executive: Kispe direct direct isse upar ha direct.
Executive: Apply kijiye.
Customer: Chhod dijiye pura to chhod dijiye chhod dijiye isko weekly weekly kar dijiye weekly kar dijiye chaliye.
Executive: Niche apply kijiye.
Executive: Apply niche niche apply.
Executive: Isko rehne dijiye apply pe click kijiye.

Executive: JK industries pe click kijiye.

Customer: Ye to khud banane wali company hai JK industries Pravesh Patel.
Customer: Jante hain aap isko.
Customer: Han ji baat hoti rehti hai.

Customer: Inka khud ka manufacturing brand hai inka star hoga star supplier hai.
Customer: Star supplier hai.
Executive: Ha dekh lijiye check karke aapke star supplier chala rahe hain.
Customer: Ha ye JK industries star supplier honge ye.
Executive: Location kaunsi hai apni.
Customer: Ranchi inka Rajkot hai.

Customer: R ke industries.
Executive: Try Kila mein hai ye.
Customer: JK industries hai Rajkot.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: R ke industry bhi hai aapke near by.
Customer: Wo to jo mere matlab ye jo filter ke baad jo aaya unka check kar lijiye.

Customer: Click karu kya inke upar.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye sir.


Executive: Okay aapko baat karungi main aapko thodi der mein.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about WhatsApp joining process.

- Not receiving buyleads from trade.indiamart.com.

- States false correspondence is being received.

- Inquires about where to find inquiries.



Resolution:

- Executive guided the customer on how to check inquiries.

- Executive shared screen sharing process to customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer back shortly.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, screen sharing, lead manager
